TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BooleanSwitch extends System.Diagnostics.Switch

summary.span: 提供简单的打开/关闭开关来控制调试和跟踪输出。

span.span: Provides a simple on/off switch that controls debugging and tracing output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以根据消息的重要性，使用布尔跟踪开关来启用或禁用消息。You can use a Boolean trace switch to enable or disable messages based on their importance. 使用 属性可获取开关的当前值。Use the property to get the current value of the switch. 你可以 通过应用程序配置文件启用或禁用，然后 在你的应用程序中使用配置的值。You can enable or disable a through the application configuration file and then use the configured value in your application. 或者，您可以 在代码中创建，并直接设置 属性以检测代码的特定部分。Alternately, you can create a in your code and set the property directly to instrument a specific section of code. 若要配置 ，请编辑与应用程序名称对应的配置文件。To configure a , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，可以添加或删除开关、设置开关的值，或者清除以前由应用程序设置的所有开关。Within this file, you can add or remove a switch, set a switch's value, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 配置文件的格式应与下面的示例类似。The configuration file should be formatted like the following example. ```xml ``` 此示例配置节定义 属性设置为的 `mySwitch` ，并将 值设置为 `true` 。This example configuration section defines a with the property set to `mySwitch` and the value set to `true`. 在应用程序中，可以通过创建一个具有相同名称的来使用已配置的开关值 ，如下面的代码示例中所示。Within your application, you can use the configured switch value by creating a with the same name, as shown in the following code example. [!code-cpp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 默认情况下， 使用配置文件中指定的值设置属性。By default, the property is set using the value specified in the configuration file. 使用值0将开关配置为，将属性设置 为 `false` ; 将开关配置为非零值，以将 属性设置为 `true` 。Configure the switch with a value of 0 to set the property to `false`; configure the switch with a nonzero value to set the property to `true`. 如果 构造函数在配置文件中找不到初始开关设置，则 `false` 默认情况下，新开关的属性将设置为。If the constructor cannot find initial switch settings in the configuration file, the property of the new switch is set to `false` by default. 您必须启用跟踪或调试才能使用交换机。You must enable tracing or debugging to use a switch. 以下语法是编译器特定的。The following syntax is compiler specific. 如果使用 c # 或 Visual Basic 以外的编译器，请参阅编译器的文档。If you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要在 c # 中启用调试，请在 `/d:DEBUG` 编译代码时将标志添加到编译器命令行，或者将添加 `#define DEBUG` 到文件的顶部。To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or you can add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，将 `/d:DEBUG=True` 标志添加到编译器命令行。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line. - 若要在 c # 中启用跟踪，请在 `/d:TRACE` 编译代码时将标志添加到编译器命令行，或将添加 `#define TRACE` 到文件的顶部。To enable tracing in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，将 `/d:TRACE=True` 标志添加到编译器命令行。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line. > [!NOTE] > 在隔离中使用类时，不需要这些调试和跟踪编译器开关 。These debug and trace compiler switches are not required when using the class in isolation. 只需结合 有条件地编译的或方法。They are only required in conjunction with or methods that are conditionally compiled. 有关检测应用程序的详细信息，请参阅 和 。For more information on instrumenting your application, see and . 有关配置和使用跟踪开关的详细信息，请参阅 [跟踪开关](/dotnet/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches)。For more information about configuring and using trace switches, see [Trace Switches](/dotnet/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches). > [!NOTE] > 若要提高性能，可以 `static` 在类中创建成员。To improve performance, you can make members `static` in your class. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并使用开关来确定是否打印错误消息。The following example creates a and uses the switch to determine whether to print an error message. 在类级别创建开关。You create the switch at the class level. `Main`方法将其位置传递到 `MyMethod` ，这会打印错误消息以及错误发生的位置。The `Main` method passes its location to `MyMethod`, which prints an error message and where the error occurred. [!code-cpp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified display name and description.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你创建时 ， `displayName` 参数用于查找初始开关设置。When you create a , the `displayName` parameter is used to find initial switch settings. 如果构造函数找不到初始设置，则将 属性设置为 `false` (禁用) 。If the constructor cannot find initial settings, the property is set to `false` (disabled). 若要设置的级别 ，请编辑与应用程序名称对应的配置文件。To set the level of your , edit the configuration file corresponding to the name of your application. 在此文件中，你可以添加开关并设置其值、删除开关或清除之前由应用程序设置的所有开关。Within this file, you can add a switch and set its value, remove a switch, or clear all switches previously set by the application. 配置文件的格式应类似于以下示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ``` > [!NOTE] > 你创建的开关应该是 `static` 。The switches you created should be `static`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并使用开关来确定是否打印错误消息。The following example creates a and uses the switch to determine whether to print an error message. 在类级别创建开关。The switch is created at the class level. `Main`方法将其位置传递到 `MyMethod` ，这会打印错误消息以及错误发生的位置。The `Main` method passes its location to `MyMethod`, which prints an error message and where the error occurred. [!code-cpp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified display name, description, and default switch value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `displayName`参数用于设置属性的值 ，而 `description` 参数用于设置属性的 属性值。The `displayName` parameter is used to set the value of the property, and the `description` parameter is use to set the value of the property. 此 `defaultSwitchValue` 参数保存为字段并用于 在第一次引用时初始化属性。The `defaultSwitchValue` parameter is saved as a field and used to initialize the property on first reference. 有关构造函数使用的详细信息，请参阅 构造函数。For more information about constructor use, see the constructor.

public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示开关已启用还是已禁用的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the switch is enabled or disabled.

value.span: 如果开关已启用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the switch is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此字段设置为 " `false` (禁用") 。By default, this field is set to `false` (disabled). 若要启用开关，请为此字段分配值 `true` 。To enable the switch, assign this field the value of `true`. 若要禁用此开关，请将值分配给 `false` 。To disable the switch, assign the value to `false`. 此属性的值由基类属性的值确定 。The value of this property is determined by the value of the base class property . > [!NOTE] > 此方法使用 标志来防止从不受信任的代码调用; 只有直接调用方才需要具有 权限。This method uses the flag to prevent being called from untrusted code; only the immediate caller is required to have permission. 如果你的代码可从部分受信任的代码调用，则不要将用户输入传递给 类方法而无需验证。If your code can be called from partially trusted code, do not pass the user input to class methods without validation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 ，并使用开关来确定是否打印错误消息。The following code example creates a and uses the switch to determine whether to print an error message. 在类级别创建开关。The switch is created at the class level. `Main`方法将其位置传递到 `MyMethod` ，这会打印错误消息和发生错误的位置。The `Main` method passes its location to `MyMethod`, which prints an error message and the location where the error occurred. [!code-cpp[Classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 调用方没有正确的权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the correct permission.

summary.span: 确定 属性的新值是否可以被解析为一个布尔值。

span.span: Determines whether the new value of the property can be parsed as a Boolean value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定新值是否为布尔值的有效字符串表示形式 ( "false" 或 "true" ) 。The method determines whether the new value is a valid string representation of a Boolean value ("false" or "true"). 如果是这样，则该方法将 属性设置为0或1。If so, the method sets the property to 0 or 1. 否则，将调用基方法，该方法将字符串值转换为整数值，然后使用该值来设置 属性。Otherwise, the base method is called, which converts the string value to an integer value, which is then used to set the property.
